description: Brandy Alexander is a classic cocktail that has been around since at least the '70s. It's most often served as an after-dinner drink, and it pairs well with desserts or other rich dishes. It contains brandy, creme de cacao, and cream.
name: Brandy Alexander

recipeInstructions.name: Combine brandy, creme de cacao, and cream in a shaker with ice.
recipeInstructions.text: Combine brandy, creme de cacao, and cream in a shaker with ice.

recipeInstructions.name: Shake well for 15 seconds and strain into a martini glass.
recipeInstructions.text: Shake well for 15 seconds and strain into a martini glass.

recipeInstructions.name: Garnish with grated nutmeg or dust of cocoa powder if desired.
